channel.title: Fixing the save way in Winterloves?
channel.description:
Ive been trying to fix this error in a clean winterloves souce. But I cant seem to get it...
[code]BlakeScape Server: Exception! java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136) at client.run(client.java:324) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Game saved for player Bryan[/code]
It saves the game fine and everything, Just it comes up with that error in the runserver for some reason

item.title: Fixing the save way in Winterloves?

item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Your welcome. I got stumped on these too until I found that kind of method. The obvious usually fixes the problems

Read full topic
